definition.name: Download a Build Artifact
definition.description: Download a build artifact that was previously uploaded in the workflow by the upload-artifact action
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Name of the artifact to download. If unspecified, all artifacts for the run are downloaded.

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Destination path. Supports basic tilde expansion. Defaults to $GITHUB_WORKSPACE

inputs.name: pattern
inputs.description: A glob pattern matching the artifacts that should be downloaded. Ignored if name is specified.

inputs.name: merge-multiple
inputs.description: When multiple artifacts are matched, this changes the behavior of the destination directories. If true, the downloaded artifacts will be in the same directory specified by path. If false, the downloaded artifacts will be extracted into individual named directories within the specified path.

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: The GitHub token used to authenticate with the GitHub API. This is required when downloading artifacts from a different repository or from a different workflow run. If this is not specified, the action will attempt to download artifacts from the current repository and the current workflow run.

inputs.name: repository
inputs.description: The repository owner and the repository name joined together by "/". If github-token is specified, this is the repository that artifacts will be downloaded from.

inputs.name: run-id
inputs.description: The id of the workflow run where the desired download artifact was uploaded from. If github-token is specified, this is the run that artifacts will be downloaded from.
